𒀀 ⇔ 𓈖?
𒀀𒂵 a.ga AQUA
𒀀𒂕 ⋍ 𒀀𒌈 a'eĝir a'egir₄ guard ≈ cored : Wehr ≈ weir ☑
𒀀𒂵𒁄 a-ga-bal agabal [HOIST] "a hoisting device (connected to a pole) for drawing water"

𒀂 agam
𒀀𒂵𒄠;𒀀𒂵𒀀𒀭;𒀀𒂵𒈬𒌝;𒀂 a-ga-am ; a-ga-am3 ; a-ga-mu-um ; agam
"an artificial pond for disposing of flood waters" #agammu

aguba [VESSEL] 𒂁𒀀𒇷𒁀 dug a-gub2-ba "a cultic vessel for water" #agubbû
